name: Suspicious AdvancedRun Execution
description: Detects the execution of AdvancedRun utility
query: (process.pe.original_file_name:/[Aa][Dd][Vv][Aa][Nn][Cc][Ee][Dd][Rr][Uu][Nn]\.[Ee][Xx][Ee]/ OR (process.command_line:/.*\ \/[Ee][Xx][Ee][Ff][Ii][Ll][Ee][Nn][Aa][Mm][Ee]\ .*/ AND process.command_line:/.*\ \/[Rr][Uu][Nn].*/) OR (process.command_line:/.*\ \/[Ww][Ii][Nn][Dd][Oo][Ww][Ss][Tt][Aa][Tt][Ee]\ 0.*/ AND process.command_line:/.*\ \/[Rr][Uu][Nn][Aa][Ss]\ .*/ AND process.command_line:/.*\ \/[Cc][Oo][Mm][Mm][Aa][Nn][Dd][Ll][Ii][Nn][Ee]\ .*/))
note: **Detection Rule without Regex for better understanding. Be careful, this way is case sensitive:**`(process.pe.original_file_name:AdvancedRun.exe OR (process.command_line:*\ \/EXEFilename\ * AND process.command_line:*\ \/Run*) OR (process.command_line:*\ \/WindowState\ 0* AND process.command_line:*\ \/RunAs\ * AND process.command_line:*\ \/CommandLine\ *))`
